title: "Diversity for Data Scientists"

What data science can (and can't) teach you about diversity, equity and inclusion.

# Lesson 1: Diversity is a Property of a Group

A metric like Simpson's diversity index can measure diversity of group, but an individual cannot be labelled as "diverse." Instead, individuals can be over- or underrepresented with respect to a group.

# Lesson 2: Bias Begets Bias

Randomization defeats bias, but we rarely randomize.
